titles.title: Stigler Act Amendments of 2017
Stigler Act Amendments of 2017
To amend the Act of August 4, 1947 (commonly known as the Stigler Act), with respect to restrictions applicable to Indians of the Five Civilized Tribes of Oklahoma, and for other purposes.
Stigler Act Amendments of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources
